resources.string: Our bunny goes shopping! Try to buy the more expensive products to spend as much money as possible. Click on a product on the shelf to kick it directly into your shopping cart. If you miss, the product is lost. Also watch out for signs that warn about slippery floor. If you crash into them, you loose precious shopping time. Click on the signs in time to push them away. Let the shopping begin!
Click on products to put them in your shopping cart. Try to choose more expensive ones to loose as much money as possible. To avoid crashing into obstacles click on them as quick as you can.
